entities.name: fireplaces
entities.description: A blurred stream of fireplaces seen by Harry Potter through his glasses.

relationships.description: Harry saw a blurred stream of fireplaces through his glasses.
Harry was standing in the stone fireplace of what looked like a large, dimly lit wizardâ€™s shop.
A glass case nearby held a withered hand on a cushion, a blood-stained pack of cards and a staring glass eye.
